module.p: trang busy is a simple adjective.

section.p: trang can be used as the predicate of the verb bi.

Examples with a human subject –
Tha Màiri agus Calum trang an diugh – tha iad ag obair anns an achadh.
Mary and Malcolm are busy today: they are working in the field. td. 7
Tha mi trang.
I am busy. td. 7
Tha sibh trang ag obair anns an achadh agus tha sibh sgìth.
You are busy working in the field and you are tired. td. 7
Tha sinn trang ag obair.
We ae busy working. td. 9
trang can be used as the complement of the adverbialising particle gu.

li.gd: Tha Calum sgìth – tha e ag obair gu trang anns an achadh.
li.tr: Malcolm is tired – he is working busily in the field.
